Since certain champs just don't get played as much anymore (Kayle/Yi) without being nerfed, it's really possible to start banning out more than just the OP picks.

Mordekaiser and Fiora are the only two I consider must-bans. Everyone's still afraid of Darius (who gets shit on by a decent top laner) and Garen (who really isn't that good anymore), so the enemy team wastes their bans on those.

Personally, I like to throw in a Diana ban or a Fizz ban every now and then, since they've got some serious bullshit to their kits (not saying they're broken, just a bit too far on the strong side for my taste).

Honestly, Morde doesn't really do well at all, unless he's got a jungler practically setting up camp in his lane and guaranteeing him Dragon.

SoloQ doesn't have the team coordination that the LCS/Worlds has. Thus he simply isn't anywhere near as powerful as you'd think he was.

Fact #1: People are matched together by their ELO.
Hypothesis #1: OP Champs require less skill for the same results.

=> (at any given ELO) the players who play OP champs must have less skills.
=> (at any given ELO) the players who play OP champs who must have less skills must deliver less result without said OP Champs.

Conclusion: By banning OP champs, you create unfair matches by having people play at lower efficiency.
By that logic, Riot the fun police would attempt to stop you by not letting you ban more champs!

Currently, it's really just make sure Darius, Veigar, and Morde are banned and then select from 20 or so insanely strong champs that require the coordination to counter that doesn't exist in Yolo Queue; Riven, Zed, LB, Kat, Blitz, Akali, Annie, Donger, Rengar, Yi, Fiora.......not saying they're all OP but impossible to reliably find counterplay of in Solo Queue. Riot, you're always talking about creating a a balanced game with lots of viable champs when in reality it's like 5 legitimately broken champions, a lot of super strong low skill ones, some mediocre ones you can get by on, and then ones so bad they're unplayable against most matchups. I love the game but I hate the state balance-wise it is in now.
